title: Black Screen at Arranging Team (Draft)

embed.description: Test your mobile network speed, wherever you may be. Download the free Ookla Speedtest app for iOS, Amazon, Android or Windows Phone.

body:
Not an internet connection issue. I have also been trying everything from restoring my PC to when i could play it last night just fine, to updating Java/Drivers. Nothing is helping.

I click "play">Normal 5v5>Draft (unranked) and from there all I can see is "Arranging team" with black screen. I am unable to even make a game, this happened a couple weeks ago but its happening again randomly now. Please fix this RIOT

replies.body: The black screen is usually caused by a network issue that's failing to establish a connection to the server and download assets.  Even if you have solid internet, you can still have issues specifically connecting to the game.  Use the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this.  These steps should help, but let me know if you have any questions!

it was fine after 6.19 went live, and was fine all week. It happened again last night, had to repatch. Could it be a client issue? It's fine after the repatch, but its a pain in the ass to continue doing.

http://www.speedtest.net/my-result/5672030075
